text: Mbe maaŋ mba shɨga namkama suaŋgim, ana mbaram won mpiiŋsɨgar kamgim, ana ana han vhen zerim, ana ana nzarigi, ‘Ndu thaŋ nzuav kha khesharigi tɨva muuŋgim, mbe ne bun nzuaim, gu ne mbararagi? Ndu ntige taagi ŋgɨv, ndu mba fhura na bigi ndiv nɨɨŋgi, ndu za ntan ntuu khergiri. Ndu ntigem wom na shɨga zɨtɨgɨp, ana ganɨnga mpiiŋsɨk kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.’
